1.text: If Gangplank successfully hits a target with Trial by Fire, he gains  15% − 30% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Every time a  Powder Keg explodes, the  cooldown for Trial by Fire resets and Gangplank gains its bonus movement speed.
1.html: If Gangplank successfully hits a target with Trial by Fire, he gains  15% − 30% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Every time a Powder Keg explodes, the  cooldown for Trial by Fire resets and Gangplank gains its bonus movement speed.

0.text: Active: Gangplank fires a shot at the target enemy that deals physical damage and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness as a  ranged attack. Parrrley can  critically strike for (175% +  35%) total damage.

ranged
critically strike
35%

1.text: If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders  gold and  Silver Serpents. Each enemy killed by a  Powder Keg explosion that was originally set off by Parrrley also counts for the plunder.

0.text: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit,  cleansing himself from all  crowd control and  healing himself.
0.html: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, cleansing himself from all crowd control and healing himself.
markedPassages: cleansing
crowd control
healing

0.text: Active: Gangplank consumes a charge to place a powder keg at the target location that lasts for 25 seconds and will connect to other kegs with overlapping connection radius through a trail of black powder. The keg starts with 3 health and loses 1 every 2 / 1 / 0.5 (based on level) seconds until it is left with 1 health. Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg charge, up to a maximum amount.
0.html: Active: Gangplank consumes a charge to place a powder keg at the target location that lasts for 25 seconds and will connect to other kegs with overlapping connection radius through a trail of black powder. The keg starts with 3 health and loses 1 every 2 / 1 / 0.5 (based on level) seconds until it is left with 1 health. Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg charge, up to a maximum amount.

1.text: Kegs can be basic attacked by enemies or Gangplank (including his  Parrrley), dealing 1 damage to it. When an enemy destroys it, it is safely defused. When Gangplank destroys it, it explodes and also triggers a chain reaction that explodes other nearby connected kegs with a 0.33 seconds-delay between explosions. The explosions also grant  sight of their radiuses for 2 seconds.
1.html: Kegs can be basic attacked by enemies or Gangplank (including his Parrrley), dealing 1 damage to it. When an enemy destroys it, it is safely defused. When Gangplank destroys it, it explodes and also triggers a chain reaction that explodes other nearby connected kegs with a 0.33 seconds-delay between explosions. The explosions also grant sight of their radiuses for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: Parrrley
sight

2.text: Enemies caught in an explosion are  slowed for 2 seconds, and are dealt the triggering attack's damage, dealing bonus physical damage against  champions. Each enemy can only be hit once per chain and the damage dealt ignores  40% of the target's armor.
2.html: Enemies caught in an explosion are slowed for 2 seconds, and are dealt the triggering attack's damage, dealing bonus physical damage against champions. Each enemy can only be hit once per chain and the damage dealt ignores  40% of the target's armor.
markedPassages: slowed
champions
40% of the target's armor
(+ 0% − 25% (based on critical strike chance)

3.text: If the triggering attack was a  critical strike, the explosions deal 5% more damage on top of the critical damage.
3.html: If the triggering attack was a critical strike, the explosions deal 5% more damage on top of the critical damage.
markedPassages: critical strike

0.text: Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting  sight of the area for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and  slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting sight of the area for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: sight
slows

1.text: Gangplank can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500  Silver Serpents each, which improve Cannon Barrage:
1.html: Gangplank can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500 Silver Serpents each, which improve Cannon Barrage:
markedPassages: Silver Serpents

2.text: Death's Daughter: A large cannonball lands in the center of the barrage after the first cluster of waves occur, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to enemies within the impact and  slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.
2.html: Death's Daughter: A large cannonball lands in the center of the barrage after the first cluster of waves occur, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to enemies within the impact and slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

textContent.text: Death's Daughter: A large cannonball lands in the center of the barrage after the first cluster of waves occur, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to enemies within the impact and  slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Death's Daughter: A large cannonball lands in the center of the barrage after the first cluster of waves occur, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to enemies within the impact and slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Death's Daughter: A large cannonball lands in the center of the barrage after the first cluster of waves occur, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to enemies within the impact and  slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

textContent.text: Fire at Will: Cannon Barrage fires「 6 additional waves 」「 2 additional clusters 」 over its duration; 18 waves of cannonballs are called down in clusters of 3 every 1.33 seconds.
textContent.html: Fire at Will: Cannon Barrage fires「 6 additional waves 」「 2 additional clusters 」 over its duration; 18 waves of cannonballs are called down in clusters of 3 every 1.33 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Fire at Will: Cannon Barrage fires「 6 additional waves 」「 2 additional clusters 」 over its duration; 18 waves of cannonballs are called down in clusters of 3 every 1.33 seconds.

textContent.text: Raise Morale: Cannon Barrage grants Gangplank and all allies within the area  30% bonus movement speed, lingering for 2 seconds.
textContent.html: Raise Morale: Cannon Barrage grants Gangplank and all allies within the area  30% bonus movement speed, lingering for 2 seconds.

textContent.text: Innate: Periodically, Gangplank empowers his next basic attack to set the target on fire, dealing them「 55 − 310 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD)  bonus true damage over 2.5 seconds, increased by 0 − 200 (based on critical strike chance). 」「 5.5 − 31 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD)  bonus true damage every 0.25 seconds over 2.5 seconds, increased by 0 − 20 (based on critical strike chance). 」 Turrets are dealt 50% damage.
textContent.html: Innate: Periodically, Gangplank empowers his next basic attack to set the target on fire, dealing them「 55 − 310 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD)  bonus true damage over 2.5 seconds, increased by 0 − 200 (based on critical strike chance). 」「 5.5 − 31 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD)  bonus true damage every 0.25 seconds over 2.5 seconds, increased by 0 − 20 (based on critical strike chance). 」 Turrets are dealt 50% damage.
markedPassages: 「 55 − 310 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD)  bonus true damage over 2.5 seconds, increased by 0 − 200 (based on critical strike chance). 」
「 5.5 − 31 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD)  bonus true damage every 0.25 seconds over 2.5 seconds, increased by 0 − 20 (based on critical strike chance). 」

textContent.text: If Gangplank successfully hits a target with Trial by Fire, he gains  15% − 30% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Every time a  Powder Keg explodes, the  cooldown for Trial by Fire resets and Gangplank gains its bonus movement speed.
textContent.html: If Gangplank successfully hits a target with Trial by Fire, he gains  15% − 30% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Every time a Powder Keg explodes, the  cooldown for Trial by Fire resets and Gangplank gains its bonus movement speed.

textContent.text: Trial by Fire cannot be applied with  Parrrley nor  Powder Keg.
textContent.html: Trial by Fire cannot be applied with Parrrley nor Powder Keg.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Trial by Fire cannot be applied with  Parrrley nor  Powder Keg.

concerningSkills.skillName: trial by fire cannot be applied with parrrley nor powder keg.

textContent.text: Active: Gangplank fires a shot at the target enemy that deals physical damage and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness as a  ranged attack. Parrrley can  critically strike for (175% +  35%) total damage.
textContent.html: Active: Gangplank fires a shot at the target enemy that deals physical damage and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness as a ranged attack. Parrrley can critically strike for (175% +  35%) total damage.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Gangplank fires a shot at the target enemy that deals physical damage and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness as a  ranged attack. Parrrley can  critically strike for (175% +  35%) total damage.

textContent.text: If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders  gold and  Silver Serpents. Each enemy killed by a  Powder Keg explosion that was originally set off by Parrrley also counts for the plunder.
textContent.html: If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders gold and Silver Serpents. Each enemy killed by a Powder Keg explosion that was originally set off by Parrrley also counts for the plunder.

skillTabs.concerningText: If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders  gold and  Silver Serpents. Each enemy killed by a  Powder Keg explosion that was originally set off by Parrrley also counts for the plunder.
If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders  gold and  Silver Serpents. Each enemy killed by a  Powder Keg explosion that was originally set off by Parrrley also counts for the plunder.

textContent.text: Silver Serpents can be spent in the shop to upgrade  Cannon Barrage.
textContent.html: Silver Serpents can be spent in the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage.

textContent.text: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit,  cleansing himself from all  crowd control and  healing himself.
textContent.html: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, cleansing himself from all crowd control and healing himself.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit,  cleansing himself from all  crowd control and  healing himself.

textContent.text: Active: Gangplank consumes a charge to place a powder keg at the target location that lasts for 25 seconds and will connect to other kegs with overlapping connection radius through a trail of black powder. The keg starts with 3 health and loses 1 every 2 / 1 / 0.5 (based on level) seconds until it is left with 1 health. Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg charge, up to a maximum amount.
textContent.html: Active: Gangplank consumes a charge to place a powder keg at the target location that lasts for 25 seconds and will connect to other kegs with overlapping connection radius through a trail of black powder. The keg starts with 3 health and loses 1 every 2 / 1 / 0.5 (based on level) seconds until it is left with 1 health. Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg charge, up to a maximum amount.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Gangplank consumes a charge to place a powder keg at the target location that lasts for 25 seconds and will connect to other kegs with overlapping connection radius through a trail of black powder. The keg starts with 3 health and loses 1 every 2 / 1 / 0.5 (based on level) seconds until it is left with 1 health. Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg charge, up to a maximum amount.

textContent.text: Kegs can be basic attacked by enemies or Gangplank (including his  Parrrley), dealing 1 damage to it. When an enemy destroys it, it is safely defused. When Gangplank destroys it, it explodes and also triggers a chain reaction that explodes other nearby connected kegs with a 0.33 seconds-delay between explosions. The explosions also grant  sight of their radiuses for 2 seconds.
textContent.html: Kegs can be basic attacked by enemies or Gangplank (including his Parrrley), dealing 1 damage to it. When an enemy destroys it, it is safely defused. When Gangplank destroys it, it explodes and also triggers a chain reaction that explodes other nearby connected kegs with a 0.33 seconds-delay between explosions. The explosions also grant sight of their radiuses for 2 seconds.

textContent.text: Enemies caught in an explosion are  slowed for 2 seconds, and are dealt the triggering attack's damage, dealing bonus physical damage against  champions. Each enemy can only be hit once per chain and the damage dealt ignores  40% of the target's armor.
textContent.html: Enemies caught in an explosion are slowed for 2 seconds, and are dealt the triggering attack's damage, dealing bonus physical damage against champions. Each enemy can only be hit once per chain and the damage dealt ignores  40% of the target's armor.

skillTabs.concerningText: Enemies caught in an explosion are  slowed for 2 seconds, and are dealt the triggering attack's damage, dealing bonus physical damage against  champions. Each enemy can only be hit once per chain and the damage dealt ignores  40% of the target's armor.

Enemies caught in an explosion are  slowed for 2 seconds, and are dealt the triggering attack's damage, dealing bonus physical damage against  champions. Each enemy can only be hit once per chain and the damage dealt ignores  40% of the target's armor.

textContent.text: If the triggering attack was a  critical strike, the explosions deal 5% more damage on top of the critical damage.
textContent.html: If the triggering attack was a critical strike, the explosions deal 5% more damage on top of the critical damage.

textContent.text: Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting  sight of the area for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and  slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting sight of the area for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.

1.originHTML: +  350

passive.originHTML:

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack on-hit within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus physical damage and restores mana equal to 40% base AD (+ 16% bonus AD) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack on-hit within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus physical damage and restores mana equal to 40% base AD (+ 16% bonus AD) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Transcendence: If you have at least 40% critical strike chance, basic attacks on-attack reduce your basic abilities' current cooldowns by 15% of their remaining cooldowns.
Unique – Impermanence: Your ability damage and proc damage dealt by abilities is increased by 0% − 20% (based on critical strike chance).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRANSCENDENCE: If you have at least 40% critical strike chance, basic attacks on-attack reduce your basic abilities' current cooldowns by 15% of their remaining cooldowns.

active.originHTML:

Unique – Sandswipe: Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 75 (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (90 second cooldown; 500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – SANDSWIPE:  Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 75 (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (90 second cooldown; 500 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cleave: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD / 20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.
Unique – Carnivorous: Gain 0.5 bonus attack damage whenever you kill a minion, doubled for kills against champions, large monsters, and large minions. This effect stacks up to 40 times, for a total of 20 bonus attack damage. Lose 60% of stacks upon death.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CLEAVE: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD /  20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.
